Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, my princess. You know it's
morning, right?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd love to watch you sleep a little
longer, but I must wake you up now.
<PAGE>
I've done what you asked me to. Take a
look in the refrigerator and storage!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd love to watch you sleep a little
longer, but I must wake you up now.
<PAGE>
About the help you asked for... I had to
put it on hold due to a lack of space.
<PAGE>
Sorry I couldn't do anything this time.
You can always ask again, of course.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, <MYNAME>, do your best at work
today. You can push yourself, just not
too hard, okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's time to rise and shine, <MYNAME>!
What a beautiful morning!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like you slept very well, am I
right? Glad to hear it!
<PAGE>
I woke up early and did everything you
told me to! Check out the refrigerator
and storage!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like you slept very well, am I
right? Glad to hear it!
<PAGE>
Uhm, I didn't do everything you asked
'coz there wasn't enough space in the
refrigerator or storage...
<PAGE>
Sorry I couldn't help you. I'll do
better next time.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's do our best again today, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wake up, wake up, my dear <MYNAME>!
Morning's here!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I take it you had a nice night of sleep!
I almost joined you for a few extra
hours.
<PAGE>
Ah, yes, I managed to do everything you
asked! If you want, go and check the
refrigerator and storage.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I take it you had a nice night of sleep!
I almost joined you for a few extra
hours.
<PAGE>
Just one thing... the help you asked
for. I couldn't do it, because we don't
have any space!
<PAGE>
Sorry about that, <MYNAME>. I'll try to
make sure it doesn't happen again.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Having said that, <MYNAME>, work hard
again today!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. The sun is up.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You had the most delightful smile on
your face. Did you have a good night's
sleep?
<PAGE>
I followed your instructions with the
utmost care.
<PAGE>
Please feel free to examine the storage
and the refrigerator at your leisure.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You had the most delightful smile on
your face. Did you have a good night's
sleep?
<PAGE>
I tried to follow your instructions, but
alas...
<PAGE>
The absence of space in the refrigerator
and the storage meant I had to give up
on the endeavor.
<PAGE>
I apologize for my inefficacy. I hope
I'm able to serve you better the next
time that you ask.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I hope today also proves to be
most productive.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, it's morning already. Come on,
<MYNAME>, wake up!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You were sleeping pretty heavily! Are
you working too hard these days? Go to
sleep earlier tonight.
<PAGE>
Oh, I almost forgot! I'm done with all
that stuff you asked me. Check the
refrigerator and the storage later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You were sleeping pretty heavily! Aren't
you working too hard these days? Go to
sleep earlier tonight.
<PAGE>
I couldn't do all the stuff you asked...
there wasn't enough space for
everything.
<PAGE>
Sorry, <MYNAME>. I'll take care of it
next time.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's work hard today as well, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, <MYNAME>. It's morning. Please
wake up.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you sleep well? It looks like you
did! You looked so lovely while you were
sleeping.
<PAGE>
I completed the chores you asked of me.
You may examine the refrigerator and the
storage afterwards.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you sleep well? It looks like you
did! You looked so lovely while you were
sleeping.
<PAGE>
I couldn't complete the chores because
there wasn't enough space in the storage
or the refrigerator to do so.
<PAGE>
I apologize for not being able to help.
Please ask for my help again and I shall
do better.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let us both try our best at work today,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Wake up, it's a
beautiful day outside!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bet you were sleeping well! I wish I'd
come sooner and slept a bit more, too!
<PAGE>
Anyway, I was doing the things you asked
me to do! You can check the refrigerator
and the storage later.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bet you were sleeping well! I wish I'd
come sooner and slept a bit more, too!
<PAGE>
Anyway, the things you asked me to do...
<PAGE>
I was in tears because I couldn't do
them! There was no way to fit everything
in the refrigerator and in the storage!
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. But I can still help
some other time!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, let's get to work, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's morning already. Wake up.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You were sleeping quite well, weren't
you? I could tell by your drooling.
Come on, wipe your chin!
<PAGE>
I was up early and did everything you
asked! Take a look at the storage and
the refrigerator later.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You were sleeping quite well, weren't
you? I could tell by your drooling.
Come on, wipe your chin!
<PAGE>
You know the things you asked me to do?
No trick could make everything fit into
the storage and the refrigerator!
<PAGE>
I'm sorry about it. Ask me again and
hopefully things will go better.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Work hard today too, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... wake up, it's already
morning...

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You seemed very happy in
your sleep... I hope you got plenty of
rest.
<PAGE>
I did my part of the chores, like you
asked. You can look over the storage and
refrigerator later.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You seemed very happy in
your sleep... I hope you got plenty of
rest.
<PAGE>
I couldn't finish my part of the chores.
There wasn't enough space in the storage
and in the refrigerator.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. I'll do better... do
better next time.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's... work hard today, too, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, <MYNAME>, the morning is here.
Please wake up.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep well
last night?
<PAGE>
I finished assisting you, all according
to schedule.
<PAGE>
Make sure you check the refrigerator and
the storage later.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Did you sleep well
last night?
<PAGE>
The chores on the schedule could not be
completed on account of no space in the
storage and the refrigerator.
<PAGE>
I apologize for not being able to help
you, <MYNAME>. Please ask me again and I
will try to do better.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. May our work be
fruitful again today.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, pumpkin, morning's here! <RED>∀</RED>
Wake up, sleepy head!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Teehee! A very nice morning to you, my
sweetie <MYNAME>. You look so cute when
you're asleep!
<PAGE>
I've gladly done all the things you
asked me to!
<PAGE>
Take a peek in the refrigerator and in
the storage before you go to work!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Teehee! A very nice morning to you, my
sweetie <MYNAME>. You look so cute when
you're asleep!
<PAGE>
I wanted to do the things you asked me
to, but the refrigerator and the storage
were too full!
<PAGE>
I'm so, so sorry, <MYNAME>... next time
I'll do it right!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, sweetie, let's work hard again
today!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, oh little <MYNAME>, wake up now!
Wake up NOW!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. You looked like you
were having a wonderful dream. Want me
to try and guess what it was?
<PAGE>
I've done everything you wanted, anyway.
Impressed? Go and check the storage and
refrigerator. You will be!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. You looked like you
were having a wonderful dream. Want me
to try and guess what it was?
<PAGE>
I couldn't fit everything into the
storage and refrigerator. Not even my
magic could help me! 
<PAGE>
I finally felt like helping you out a
little, too. Maybe I'll agree to help
you  again some time? We'll see.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, <MYNAME>. Time for work!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, <PARENT>! Why are you still
sleeping? It's morning already!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <PARENT>. Did you sleep
well?
<PAGE>
I'm finished with the task you gave me.
I woke up really early to get it done!
<PAGE>
I've loaded out the storage and the
refrigerator. Go take a look!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <PARENT>. Did you have
nice dreams?
<PAGE>
The task you gave me was impossible! The
storage and the refrigerator were too
full!!
<PAGE>
Sorry I couldn't make it, <PARENT>.
I'll try harder next time.

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Give your best at work today, too,
<PARENT>!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, <PARENT>! How long do you plan
to sleep today? Wake up!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <PARENT>. Did you sleep
well?
<PAGE>
I just finished the chores you gave me.
Quite the start to the day!
<PAGE>
I've loaded out the storage and the
refrigerator. Go take a look!

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <PARENT>. Did you sleep
well?
<PAGE>
I couldn't finish those chores you gave
me, because the refrigerator and the
storage were already full.
<PAGE>
I'm very sorry, <PARENT>. Just ask me
again another time, okay?

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Give your best at work today, too,
<PARENT>!
